page.title: 10ST STEPHENS HOMES SURVEY.
page.content: Ian surveyed 20 houses in his street, asking 10 questions..Do you own TV, washing machine computer car and pets, and how many work and their hobbies. 38 adults live in 20 houses and 13 children. There are 22 cars 22 pets 25 TVs 17 washing machines and 6 computers. 22 go to work. Hobbies are gardening sport wine-making DIY bird- watching and photography. S2 also did a survey of 45 St. Stephens children who live near our school. 18 live in terrace houses 13 in detached houses and 13 in semi-detached houses. There is an average of 4.5 people in a house, and 2.5 children.Each house has a bathroom and indoor toilet. All children went to playschool .There were 28 computers 10 dishwashers 45 frig. 42 deep freeze. 30 children have been abroad 40 to London and 45 have been in Canterbury Cathedral.
